statements: SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio;
SELECT investor_id, asset_name FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT asset_name, performance_metric FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE asset_allocation > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio ORDER BY performance_metric DESC;
SELECT investor_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE asset_allocation < 0.3 ORDER BY investor_id ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_allocation FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE investor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE asset_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY asset_allocation DESC;
SELECT AVG(performance_metric) AS average_performance FROM InvestmentPortfolio GROUP BY asset_type;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE asset_allocation > 0.5 AND performance_metric < 0.7;
SELECT investor_id, COUNT(asset_name) AS num_assets FROM InvestmentPortfolio GROUP BY investor_id HAVING num_assets > 2;
SELECT * FROM investors;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name, investment_amount FROM investors WHERE investor_id = 1;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investors WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT portfolio_name, allocation FROM portfolios ORDER BY allocation DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE portfolio_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name, investment_amount FROM investors WHERE investor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM investors WHERE investment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE performance_metrics ->> 'return' > '0.05' AND allocation < 0.5;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM investors GROUP BY investor_id, investor_name;
SELECT portfolio_name, investor_id, AVG(allocation) AS avg_allocation FROM portfolios GROUP BY portfolio_name, investor_id ORDER BY avg_allocation DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE investor_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, allocation_percentage FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT investor_name FROM Investors WHERE investor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE daily_return > 0.05 AND monthly_return < 0.2;
SELECT asset_name, asset_quantity, performance_metric FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE performance_metric > 0.7 ORDER BY performance_metric DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE performance_metric > 0.5 ORDER BY asset_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT investor_name, asset_name, asset_quantity, allocation_percentage FROM Investors JOIN InvestmentPortfolio ON Investors.investor_id = InvestmentPortfolio.investor_id WHERE Investors.investor_id = 1001;
SELECT asset_type, COUNT(*) AS total_assets FROM InvestmentPortfolio GROUP BY asset_type HAVING SUM(asset_quantity) > 100;

SELECT investor_name, SUM(allocation_percentage) AS total_allocation FROM Investors JOIN InvestmentPortfolio ON Investors.investor_id = InvestmentPortfolio.investor_id GROUP BY investor_name ORDER BY total_allocation DESC;
SELECT investor_id, asset_name, MONTHLY_RETURN FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE investor_id = 2001 AND MONTHLY_RETURN < 0 ORDER BY MONTHLY_RETURN ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Investors;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM Investors ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM Assets WHERE asset_value > 10000;
SELECT investor_id, investor_name, investment_amount FROM Investors WHERE investment_amount < 5000;
SELECT asset_name, return_rate FROM Assets INNER JOIN Performance ON Assets.asset_id = Performance.asset_id;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM Investors;
SELECT * FROM Assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stock' ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM Assets WHERE asset_value >= 10000;
SELECT investor_name, asset_name, allocation FROM Investors JOIN Portfolio ON Investors.investor_id = Portfolio.investor_id;
SELECT asset_name, return_rate FROM Assets JOIN Performance ON Assets.asset_id = Performance.asset_id WHERE performance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Investors ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Investors WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT DISTINCT asset_type FROM Investments;
SELECT investor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_investments FROM Investments GROUP BY investor_id;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY transaction_type ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Investors WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT investor_id, name, email FROM Investors WHERE city = 'New York' AND zip_code = '10001';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, investment_amount FROM Investments WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT asset_name FROM AssetAllocation WHERE allocation_percentage > 20;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY metric_value ASC LIMIT 5;
